entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
